title: Professional Service
description:
Original definition: "provider of professional services."
        
        The general ProfessionalService type
        for local businesses was deprecated due to confusion with Service.
        For reference, the types that it included were: Dentist,
        AccountingService,
        Attorney,
        Notary, as well as types for several kinds of
        HomeAndConstructionBusiness:
        Electrician,
        GeneralContractor,
        HousePainter,
        Locksmith,
        Plumber,
        RoofingContractor.
        LegalService was introduced as a more
        inclusive supertype of Attorney.
